text: Martadoris limaciformis is a species of sea slug, a dorid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Polyceridae.MolluscaBase (2018). Martadoris limaciformis (Eliot, 1908). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species on 2018-09-09. ==Distribution== This species was described from 2 m depth at Shab ul Shubuk, Sudan, Red Sea, . It has been reported from the Indian Ocean and Indonesia.Anderson, J., 2011. Tambja limaciformis, Ekstasi, Palau Wainilu, Komodo, Indonesia. Retrieved 09-09-2018. ==References== Category:Polyceridae Category:Gastropods described in 1908
title: Martadoris limaciformis
